thread.title: Zeel Expands Its On-Demand Massage Services To The Tampa Bay Area
thread.title_full: Zeel Expands Its On-Demand Massage Services To The Tampa Bay Area

title: Zeel Expands Its On-Demand Massage Services To The Tampa Bay Area
text: Reprint NEW YORK , Oct. 26, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Continuing its expansion in Florida , Zeel , The Massage Experts Â®, launched in the Tampa Bay Area today. Tampa / Saint Petersburg region massage lovers join their Floridian counterparts in the Miami , Ft. Lauderdale , and Palm Beach areas and can now schedule and enjoy five-star, spa-quality massages in as little an hour, in the comfort and convenience of their own homes. "The Tampa - St. Petersburg-Clearwater region is one of the fastest-growing areas in the United States , both in terms of population and job growth," says Samer Hamadeh , Zeel founder and CEO. "With a burgeoning tech scene, a lively economy, and 361 days of sunshine a year, it makes perfect sense to expand Zeel's Florida coverage to the Tampa Bay Area ."With Zeel, the massage comes to your home, hotel, workplace, or event - eliminating the need for travel. Zeel Massages can be booked through the Zeel app for iPhone and Android and on zeel.com, and are available for start times as early as 8:00 am and as late as 10:30 pm , seven days a week, 365 days a year. Customers may schedule a Zeel Massage in as little as an hour in advance, or up to a month ahead of time. Massage options include Swedish, deep tissue, prenatal, sports, and couples massage; 60-minute, 75-minute, and 90-minute massages are available. The therapist brings a table and supplies - the customer just needs to open the door. All Zeel Massage Therapists are fully vetted, experienced, background-checked, and licensed in their state of practice. Zeel also offers the first and only in-home premium massage membership, Massage Zeelot, which includes a Zeel Massage a month for a year, a professional-grade massage table, and many other benefits. Zeel Chair Massage, perfect for workplaces, conventions, and events, is available nationwide. 1 of 3
